nodes.text: The Comeuppance was a modified BTA-NR2 Y-wing starfighter owned by Zorii Bliss, leader of the Spice Runners of Kijimi. When Bliss escaped Kijimi before the Sith Eternal destroyed the planet on the orders of Darth Sidious, she took the droidsmith Babu Frik with her in the Comeuppance. She later joined up with the Resistance during the Battle of Exegol.

The Comeuppance first appeared in the 2019 film Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker, and was first identified in the 2020 novelization of the film, written by Rae Carson. In Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: A Junior Novel, written by Michael Kogge and also published in 2020, the Comeuppance is mistakenly referred to as an X-wing starfighter.
